name: Gravity Run (itch) (lollocenne)
description:
Gravity Run

Run and avoid obstacles, use gravity inverters to reverse gravity

How to use button:

Press for less than 1 second to select, press for more than 1 second and less than 2 seconds to go forward, press for more than 2 seconds to go back.
In game press to jump.

Created for 1-Button Jam 2022

Made with microstudio
